about_the_game:
Are you ready to rock? Ragnarock is a solo/multiplayer rhythm game in which you play a viking captain competing in a ship race. With your two hammers, crush the incoming runes in sync with epic viking music. Keep hitting the runes perfectly to accumulate combo energy in your hammers, and you will be able to activate a speed boost!

In this free demo, you will be able to play three songs in solo mode on three levels of difficulty. Train as much as you want to beat the high scores on the worldwide leaderboard! Check out the full game : more than 50 songs, new environmnents, custom song support, and customization options await you there!
detailed_description:
Are you ready to rock? Ragnarock is a solo/multiplayer rhythm game in which you play a viking captain competing in a ship race. With your two hammers, crush the incoming runes in sync with epic viking music. Keep hitting the runes perfectly to accumulate combo energy in your hammers, and you will be able to activate a speed boost!

In this free demo, you will be able to play three songs in solo mode on three levels of difficulty. Train as much as you want to beat the high scores on the worldwide leaderboard! Check out the full game : more than 50 songs, new environmnents, custom song support, and customization options await you there!
legal_notice: Ragnaröck uses Unreal® Engine. Unreal® is a trademark or registered trademark of Epic Games, Inc. in the United States of America and elsewhere. Unreal® Engine, Copyright 1998 – 2020, Epic Games, Inc. All rights reserved.
name: Ragnaröck Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 bits)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7300HQ equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 equivalent
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 bits)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-6700HQ equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1070 equivalent

short_description: Lead your viking ship to victory in this rhythm game! Pound your drums to the sound of epic music, from celtic rock to viking power metal, and set sail against your rivals in multiplayer mode. Will you outrace them all and carve your name on top of the leaderboard?
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese
